file_content.text: You spent your life walking the Jedi path. This is where it led. Was it worth the journey?
The way of the Jedi is not about reward or regret. And I haven't lost my companions yet.
I will not fear the future.
The Order warns against forming attachments, but I can't let them die.
Not if I lose my friends.
This is a soldier's fate. You can join them, or choose a better destiny.
Only cowards choose how they die. Soldiers accept their fate.
That's not how war works.
I've never been afraid to die. But I want my people to live.
Havoc Squad deserves better.
You can escape their fate if you dare to be more than a criminal.
I like being a criminal. It's kind of my thing.
I see no reason to change.
I know a con when I hear one. What's your game, old man?
What are you playing at?
The old ways held you back. You barely tapped your true potential. It is time you are unleashed.
Do not presume to know me. My power is beyond your imagination.
Never doubt my power.
I know what I should be. If you have a plan, let's hear it.
I couldn't agree more.
You have always been superior to everyone around you. Even them. Release your past. Become greater.
This is why you don't have any friends. Some jobs aren't worth taking.
With you? Not interested.
I'm already the best. Always have been, always will be.
I can't get any greater.
You have unlimited power to change reality. Choose to become something greater than you are now.
We both wield power from the shadows. What do you offer that I don't already have?
Go ahead, tell me how.
Never try to manipulate someone like me. It always backfires.
I'm on to your game.
You changed your face and voice, but you still speak in riddles. You're wasting my time.
Enough of this nonsense.
Haha....
